programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other. Cookie Monster draws his blue fur, his googly eyes, and cookies. Charlie draws her blue eyes, curly blonde hair, tap shoes, and challah bread because it’s one of her favorite Jewish foods. Julia draws her straight hair, musical notes, paw prints, and her dog Rose. Elmo draws his red fur, orange nose, a piano, and watering a flower with Abby because being a kind neighbor is part of Elmo’s identity. Tamir draws his brown skin, coily hair, comic books, and some veggies as he loves gardening in the community garden. There are so many special things that make you, you!

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo shares his scooter with Zoe and learns how to be patient and wait for his turn, while she practices and learns how to ride.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Frankie the worm wants to play with her cousins, but they moved to another planter. Rosita, Gabrielle, and Zoe think like engineers to help Frankie. What if we build a bridge that connects the planters? Let’s try!

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo and Abby help Crystal the Ball come up with a morning routine so she can be ready to go out and play.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: When Rudy and Zoe feel nervous about getting ready for kindergarten, Ji-Young and Baby Bear host a game show all about school to help Rudy and Zoe learn about classroom rules and figuring out how to solve math problems.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: To make food shopping more fun, Alan turns it into a game. Elmo, Abby, and Cookie Monster need to find three foods that start with the letter C from different sections of the supermarket. Can they get the food in Alan’s cart before he finishes checking out?

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.desc: Peggy explores Taiwan's top five alternative therapies and learns about those keeping traditional ways of healing alive today.

programme.title: Taiwan Top 5
programme.desc: Jolie explores Taiwan's top five Western food with a Taiwanese twist. Join her as she learns why these have become so popular among locals and tourists alike.

programme.title: Taiwan Top 5

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren’s first stop on his food trail of South Africa is the bustling city of Cape Town. Here, he visits a lively farmers market and cooks up a Cape Malay Curry in Bo Kaap.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren continues his food trail along South Africa’s Cape Coast, stopping off at the township of Khayelitsha, home to some inspiring micro-farming initiatives, before arriving at Grootbos Private Nature Reserve.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren heads to the Cape Winelands, where he tastes a variety of local wines including Pinotage, a signature South African red, and Ratafia, a unique and complex fortified wine.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren’s next stop on his food trail is Tswalu Nature Reserve, in the heart of the Kalahari Desert. Warren then meets with acclaimed Chef Marnus to cook up some exciting South African delicacies.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren is heading out of Cape Town into the more quiet coastal area of the Western Cape, and the picturesque town of Paternoster. It’s here he’ll marvel at the seaside village feel and take an e-bike ride along the beach.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: As the final stanza in Warren’s Food Trail of South Africa, he’s back in the bush, a quintessential part of all travel to the rainbow nation.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren heads to the coastal city of Durban - where he’s staying at the iconic Oyster Box hotel.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: In Durban, Warren visits the famous restaurant Max’s Lifestyle for an indulgent Shisa Nyama experience, before meeting with local guide Thoko to visit a nearby Zulu village.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren’s next stop on his food trail is Kruger National Park, one of South Africa’s largest game reserves, where he’s staying at the renowned Sabi Sabi lodge.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: In the heart of the Kalahari Desert, Warren spots a myriad of African animals, and learns to make traditional rusks to go with his morning coffee.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren stops off at the historic city of Pretoria, where he visits the local farmers markets and cooks Koeksisters - South African sticky donuts - with Pastry Chef Nonkosi.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren is in the bustling city of Johannesburg, and his first stop is the vibrant township of Soweto. He’s taken on a tuk tuk tour by his guide Sindi, and cooks up his version of Chakalala, a South African vegetable relish.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Lurking beneath the waters of the northwest is some of the best seafood in the country and in fact, the world. We meet the original custodians of the areas and we taste the food they helped them thrive in this region. Seattle’s seafood scene has grown into one of the best in the world.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the world’s first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where he’ll visit Newton Johnson, the ‘wine farm with a view’.

programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this engaging episode, Reilly shares his rhino release dream. It’s time for Judy’s beloved duiker to return to the wild. And, a routine nyala capture takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: In Malaysia, dogs are used to sniff out illegal DVDs while in UK, dogs are trained to search a fire scene and identify flammable liquids.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Inside Africa: ?Inside Africa's 25th Anniversary: Lupita & Angelique at the Met
programme.desc: As part of?Inside Africa's?25th anniversary, we have a sit-down between two of the continent's most celebrated voices: Angelique Kidjo?and Lupita Nyong'o. The setting is The Met's newly reimagined?Arts of Africa?gallery, a powerful space in which to reflect on African creativity, identity, and legacy. Five-time Grammy award winning Kidjo and Oscar-winning actor Nyong'o reflect on their careers and the rise and influence of African culture across the world.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East: Marketplace Middle East December 2025/Marketplace Africa: Nigeria E1 Boat Racing/Developing Nigeria's Waterways; Samer Kassem
programme.desc: The latest, up-to-date news stories from around the globe./In Lagos Nigeria, 17% of the state is composed of waterways and lagoons. But water transportation is highly underutilized, despite poor road infrastructure and traffic congestion. Now, the state actively seeking to develop its waterways network through public ferries and private operators as well as a partnership with the international boat racing franchise E1, with the first African E1 event taking place in October. E1 is also looking to grow their presence on the continent through digital education and outreach, something that is launching in tandem with the event in October. We take a look at the challenges and opportunities of developing Lagos' waterways, and the potential economic boost of tapping into the region's blue economy. Also, Aspen Global CEO Samer Kassem sits down to discuss the biopharmaceutical giant's growth strategy and the markets he believes will grow in the coming years.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Problem Child in House
programme.desc: A collection of outrageous problems that you have never heard of! A great 'knowledge talk show' where problematic children who are struggling and fighting in the emotional rooftop room gain true wisdom about life and the world.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: A talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Uncontrollably Fond
programme.desc: It's a love story of a man and woman who meet again after they broke up in the past. The man, in the presence of his death, wishes to make amends. Their romance will have you seek comfort and hope in love.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible 2
programme.desc: The training academy from Dogs Are Incredible! For pet owners struggling with issues like biting, aggression, or excessive barking from their beloved dogs who've become part of the family. Experts from various fields provide customized training methods and tailored advice — helping unruly dogs transform into well-behaved companions!

programme.title: Got The Spot

programme.title: Are You Human?
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. Just as the mission is completed and they prepare to leave, Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured. Determined to save her, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and rescue her.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: The Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Phi, a veteran boxer, sets out on a quest for revenge after the ruthless crime lord Ba Rau killed his wife. His journey takes him into the remote village near Foggy Mountain, where he discovers Ba Rau's human trafficking activities. The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wife’s death.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Dawn met Carey while working on the West Coast, where they started their family. Now that Carey has retired, Dawn has convinced him to move back home with her to the East Coast.

programme.title: Best In Chow

programme.title: Earth Sweepers
programme.desc: The Earth-Cleaning Bros’ second mission: planting trees in the Elsen Tasarkhai desert! Led by self-proclaimed Mongolian expert Shaun, they set out with just one GPS coordinate.

programme.title: One Night Stand Murder
programme.desc: A woman must fight to clear her name after she wakes up in an unfamiliar house with a dead man - and no memory of what happened. Based on true events.

programme.title: The Face I Can't Forget
programme.desc: After waking from a car accident with total amnesia, Mia is taken home to be cared for by her loving husband and daughter. But as she recuperates, Mia has flashbacks of a second daughter.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Denise has a growth on her booty, but scarring from a previous trauma has kept her from getting it removed. Zachary is a drag artist whose touring career is dragged down by his debilitating psoriasis.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: A wholesale deal in Pinellas Park looks like a three bed house with potential, but when they get there it seems to be more trouble than it's worth. The third bedroom is a garage with an electric panel.

programme.title: Dating Hell
programme.desc: Hannah uses a dating app to find the wonderful Daniel. Soon after, Hannah's babysitter is murdered and Hannah herself barely escapes. Someone wants her dead for certain, but what if it's not Daniel?

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Marissa and Sean need more space. With a growing toddler and Sean working from home, they are busting at the seams. They want a house with a great view and coastal charm.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Avid ocean-lovers Kimberley and Paul are moving to the East Coast to retire and live out their seafront dream. But their big dreams come with a lot of water toys that they need to accommodate.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: In this episode Rachael's in party mode and she's firing up popcorn with popcorn chicken. If you like those both super-spicy, you've come to the right place at the right time.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: Rachael takes us on an Aegean adventure with a recipe for Greek-style lamb meatballs and her very own creation: feta-sghetti, a spaghetti dish served with a decadent white feta sauce.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: Rachael demonstrates how to make your own takeaway at home and how to stock your pantry for today's recipe: chicken chow fun, a Chinese-American favourite with a rice-noodle base and vegetables.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Jon's huge, 25-year-old shoulder-blade bump is ruining his family beach days and risking his health. April wants the wedding of her dreams but feels hideous in gowns due to her bumpy underarm "threast".

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Tobi is having trouble re-entering the dating pool because of symmetrical, bottom-shaped bumps around her spine. Tia is a beautiful young woman whose huge scalp growth has sent her into self-imposed exile.

programme.title: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Cheryl discovers her daughter Lauren is missing. Despite Cheryl's efforts to seek help from authorities and the media, her pleas are overshadowed by the attention given to the missing white girl's case.

programme.desc: Hannah uses a dating app to find the wonderful Daniel. Soon after, Hannah's babysitter is murdered and Hannah herself barely escapes. Someone wants her dead for certain, but what if it's not Daniel?

programme.title: Squala
programme.desc: Hudlo (Joko Diaz) is a good natured young man -- polite, compassionate, honest. But one day, his father is killed, and all his uprightness is abandoned.

programme.title: Praybeyt Benjamin
programme.desc: Vice plays the role of Benjamin Santos whose family has a long tradition of serving in the military. Conflict ensues when Lolo Benjamin (Eddie Garcia) found out that his grandson is gay.

programme.title: Abay Babes
programme.desc: It tells the story of five girls who have been best friends since high school and are reunited for a wedding of the least attractive person in their group.

programme.title: Bakit Lahat ng Gwapo May Boyfriend?
programme.desc: Kylie (Anne Curtis), a wedding planner has had a long string of boyfriends. Unfortunately for her, they've all been gay.

programme.title: Seoulmeyt
programme.desc: A Filipina K-drama fan meets the man of her dreams but things take a turn as she discovers the truth behind his pretend personality.

programme.title: Akin Ang Labang Ito
programme.desc: Dario rescues a powerful syndicate head, Don Manolo, from an assassination attempt. Meanwhile, Carlo discovers the Don's business in drugs and he tries to quit.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Ikaw Pa Rin Ang Pipiliin Ko
programme.desc: Music gives her life. Music is his life. This is a story that will make our hearts skip a beat this season of love.

programme.title: Sanggano, Sanggago't Sanggwapo 2: Aussie! Aussie! (Osige)
programme.desc: The sequel to the misadventures of wacky trio. Their quiet simple lives as resort staff turn problematic when seductive and sexy girls check-in at their place.

programme.title: Ulan
programme.desc: Maya (Nadine Lustre) is a girl who has always held a pessimistic view of the rain, reminding her of failed love and other depressing things. Will the rain ever stop her in her journey to overcome past heartaches?

programme.title: Bayad Puri
programme.desc: Cases of sexual harassment in the present-day Philippine society were what made up BAYAD PURI, another powerful film by Joel Lamangan.

programme.title: Unfaithful Wife 2
programme.desc: Jennifer's (Patricia Javier) life looks perfect: she's beautiful, she's rich, and she has Jimmy (Ian Veneracion), a wonderful husband. But in spite of everything, there remains a wound inside her that refuses to heal.

programme.title: Ang Pahina
programme.desc: Because of Mira’s (Kiray Celis) determination to convinced her loved one study, she, together with her mother Linda, Mang Johnny and Paul all have graduated with flying colors with the help of DepEd’s Alternative Learning System.

programme.title: Wala Ka Nang Lupang Tatapakan
programme.desc: A soldier whose dedication to duty is unwavering, Daniel finds himself going against authority when his wife and son were murdered. With the local police unwilling to go after the perpetrator of the crime, Daniel decides to take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Dito Sa Puso Ko
programme.desc: Ligaya Tatlonghari (Judy Ann Santos) is a movie fan in every sense of the word--she eats and breathes showbiz. She has two foremost dreams: to travel to the United States, and to join her favorite TV game show.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 E08 - The Classic Murder
programme.desc: Famed mystery writer Jessica Fletcher has a gift for solving mysteries and murder always follows her around, whether it be to the houses of her seemingly endless number of friends, nieces, and nephews, or right in her hometown.

programme.title: CSI S4 E09 - Grissom Versus the Volcano
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Jake spends the night in the mountains after his snowmobile breaks down. Paul traps for mink and pine marten. Eustace helps a friend buy and assemble an antique sawmill.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: The pyramids of Egypt are among the most significant wonders of the ancient world. More than 4,000 years old, they are among the most celebrated architectural marvels in the world.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Most of the world's holiest places sit in plain sight. But there are some hidden. The revered tomb of Jesus Christ and a prehistoric temple in Malta with mystical properties—why were they concealed?

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The twisted origin stories of some of history's most diabolically creative, and brutal, torture devices—from the Iron Maiden to the pear of anguish.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team has a chance to finally solve the case of the USS Cyclops. Missing since 1918 with 309 sailors, this 500-foot freighter represents the single deadliest Bermuda Triangle loss.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)
programme.desc: Rick and the gang geek out when some cool items from the space program land in the store: a U.S. flag from Apollo 16, an Apollo program book featuring a Charles Schultz signature and a far out meteoroid.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Most of the world's holiest places sit in plain sight. But there are some hidden. The revered tomb of Jesus Christ and a prehistoric temple in Malta with mystical properties—why were they concealed?

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team has a chance to finally solve the case of the USS Cyclops. Missing since 1918 with 309 sailors, this 500-foot freighter represents the single deadliest Bermuda Triangle loss.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Jake spends the night in the mountains after his snowmobile breaks down. Paul traps for mink and pine marten. Eustace helps a friend buy and assemble an antique sawmill.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: The pyramids of Egypt are among the most significant wonders of the ancient world. More than 4,000 years old, they are among the most celebrated architectural marvels in the world.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The towering obelisks of ancient Egypt weigh hundreds of tonnes and each was carved from a single granite rock. Ancient Astronaut Theorists suggest they may have served a technological purpose.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: Dr. Jacques Vallee holds multiple scientific degrees and is one of the fathers of the internet. Will Dr. Vallee's work lead to answers about what has been happening in our skies for thousands of years?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: With the help of science, the Fellowship uncovers an irrefutable connection between the Money Pit and Lot 5.

programme.title: Alone (S12)
programme.desc: The remaining survivalists make a final push to the finish line, but only one can win the $500,000 prize and make Alone history as the first winner in a desert climate.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: Buckle up as we take you on a wild journey into the world of vintage daredevils who risked it all for a rush. From the enigmatic Human Fly to skateboard speed demons, these stunts were unforgettable.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)
programme.desc: Andy and Paul partner with the Navajo Rangers and an experiencer with unprecedented access to forbidden land in Navajo Nation to hunt for evidence of Skinwalkers.

programme.title: The Death Coast
programme.desc: Following the trail of a cache of precious gemstones, Jeff and the team move further beyond the breakers, in search of The Neptune. With stormy weather closing in, a new find may lead them one step closer.

programme.title: Sa Bingit Ng Kamatayan
programme.desc: Susan was about to go on a test flight with her mountaineer buddy, Daniel. They were about to take off when a group of desperados arrived and took them as hostages. Discover how they outlived this plane-crashing experience and got back the millions of pesos from these bad elements.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Captain Barbell (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Teng-Teng is an orphan who works by collecting junk from the streets. One day, as a rewards for his good deeds, he was given the magic barbel, which empowers him to be Captain Barbel.

programme.title: Imortal (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Imortal refers to a love so great and so enduring, it defied conventions, tragedy and even the limitations of time.

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Sgt. Victor Magno: Kumakasa, Kahit Nag-iisa
programme.desc: Sgt. Victor Magno: Kumakasa, Kahit Nag-iisa

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Ayra (Sharon Cuneta), an heiress who came home to bury her dead father and who later discovered that her family's estate had been taken over by Edwin (Richard Gomez), her childhood sweetheart and the son of their former overseer.

programme.title: Gayuma
programme.desc: This story is about an adult contemporary Filipino film that tackled the subject of paganism and black magic in the sex culture of Filipinos.

programme.title: Bokyo
programme.desc: Bokyo's parents fight all the time and neglect their son's basic needs. He leaves home despite reassurances from his alien friend, Starking, that everything will turn out for the best.

programme.title: Nandito Ako
programme.desc: He is a lieutenant in the NBI. She is a manager of a stuff toys company. Sparks have flown when it became the lieutenant's job to bring the manager safely to Manila to become a witness. They argued, they fought and then they fell in love.

programme.title: Habang May Buhay
programme.desc: Pia found herself in the same predicament as her mother did years ago. During that time, Zeny gave up her true love to marry a man whom her parents preferred. This time around Pia was engaged to Jonathan although she was in love with Gary.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: An award winning, multi-platform 24-hour business and financial news network, Bloomberg Television provides continuous coverage of the people, companies and ideas that move global markets. Broadcasting from centers in New York, London, Hong Kong and Singapore and powered with an unparalleled news gathering team of 2,300 news professionals in 146 bureaus across 72 countries worldwide, Bloomberg Television delivers real-time business news to over 310 million households globally. In addition to live streaming to 310,000 Bloomberg Professional subscribers, Bloomberg Television also broadcasts in hotels, central banks, investment institutions, commercial banks, government offices, law firms, corporations and news organizations. Bloomberg Television is part of Bloomberg Media Group which offers an integrated array of business media: online, mobile, digital applications, television and business print products.

In addition to live streaming to 310,000 Bloomberg Professional subscribers, Bloomberg Television also broadcasts in hotels, central banks, investment institutions, commercial banks, government offices, law firms, corporations and news organizations. Bloomberg Television is part of Bloomberg Media Group which offers an integrated array of business media: online, mobile, digital applications, television and business print products.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Travel Kagoshima Pref. on the Ibusuki-Makurazaki Line, JR's southernmost line. Discover a 400-year pottery tradition, walk around a samurai neighborhood, and admire views of an active volcano.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Playful Everyday Fabric. Textiles are everywhere in our lives. From bold patterns and vivid colors to updated designs for traditional cloth. Explore a world of playful fabric designs.

programme.desc: How many benches seating 4 are needed for 14 children? Barky steps in to illustrate how to understand divisions and remainders, concluding that 1 more bench is needed.

programme.title: SAMURAI WISDOM
programme.desc: Yoshimune, the shogun who saved the city of Edo. Through disaster and economic strife, alongside its people, his wisdom shaped the future of the place now called Tokyo.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to river or stream. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.desc: A week into the new year, giant torches are lit in a shrine precinct. The shadows they create enable a demon-oni-to go to a river and cleanse people of troubles. This is Oniyo: the night of the oni.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 3
programme.desc: Reeling from failure, Jordan begins to spiral, while Jonathan discovers newfound strength. General Lane recruits John Henry and Natalie Irons to the DOD.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 4
programme.desc: The Kents struggle to adjust to their new normal. Lois helps throw Kyle and Chrissy an impromptu wedding that doesn’t quite go as planned.

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: The winner of 11 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, Best Director and Best Actor, Ben-Hur stands as one of the greatest Hollywood epics ever filmed.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 7
programme.desc: Bernadette pressures Howard to move out of his mother's house.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 8
programme.desc: Howard and Raj try to get to the bottom of why Sheldon disappears every afternoon at 2:45. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny wrestle with jealousy in their relationship.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend Of The Sword
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Guy Ritchie brings his dynamic style to the epic fantasy action adventure "King Arthur: Legend of the Sword." Starring Charlie Hunnam in the title role, the film is an iconoclastic take on the classic Excalibur myth, tracing Arthur's journey from the streets to the throne. When the child Arthur's father is murdered, Vortigern (Jude Law), Arthur's uncle, seizes the crown. Robbed of his birthright and with no idea who he truly is, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, his life is turned upside down and he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy...whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: The world's most revered monster is reborn as visionary new director Gareth Edwards (Monsters) unleashes the epic action adventure GODZILLA. Starring an international ensemble cast led by Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Oscar nominee Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai, Inception), Elizabeth Olsen, Oscar winner Juliette Binoche (The English Patient) and Oscar nominee Sally Hawkins (Blue Jasmine) with Oscar nominee David Strathairn (Good Night, and Good Luck.) and Breaking Bad's Bryan Cranston, GODZILLA is a powerful story of human courage and reconciliation in the face of titanic forces of nature -- when the awe-inspiring creature rises to restore balance as humanity stands defenseless. This spectacular adventure pits the world's most famous monster against malevolent creatures that, bolstered by humanity's scientific arrogance, threaten our very existence.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 9
programme.desc: When the University reassigns Sheldon’s (unused) parking spot to Howard, the ensuing turf battle affects the whole gang.

programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys polish their skills as manicurists in an unsuspecting nail salon, get touchy feely with patrons in a comic book store, and race through the aisles of a grocery store.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 5
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys say all the wrong things when conducting sensitivity training, have unexpected celebrity sightings on the street, and are forced into being unreceptive receptionists in a busy office.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 6
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys share shameful secrets in the park, don headsets at a fast food drive-through, and try to convince unsuspecting strangers to dance with them.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 7
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys enlist shoppers to settle senseless debates in the mall, scream for ice-cream as patrons in a parlor, and protest unconventional causes in the park.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 8
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys debut uninspiring inventions to stunned focus groups, use people for pillows as they fall asleep in the park, and talk shoppers out of their desired products in a grocery store.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 9
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys search for imaginary places with a little help from strangers, pick their own poison in the park, and there's a surprise behind every door in the horrifyinghunt for a house-sitter.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 10
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys endure a shakedown in a discount store, put their fate in the hands of the "Wheel of Doom," and try to hack it as Hibachi chefs without going up in flames.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 22
programme.desc: Will gets hustled in a pool hall and almost loses the family Mercedes, but Philip comes to his rescue, outhustling the hustlers.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 23
programme.desc: Determined to prove that he's just as "black" as his cousin, Carlton accepts Will's challenge to survive for two days in a very tough Los Angeles neighborhood.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 24
programme.desc: Will and Carlton spy on Ashley when she goes on her "first date" with a famous young rap singer named Little T.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 25
programme.desc: To keep her new job as personal assistant to a movie star (Oscar-nominated guest star Queen Latifah - "Chicago"), Hilary has to accept a date with Will's best friend, Jazz.

programme.title: Full House S1 1
programme.desc: Three grown men experiencing the "joys of motherhood," as they raise three adorable girls in a Full House.

programme.title: Full House S1 2
programme.desc: The girls are rockin' when Uncle Jesse is left in charge of them for the night, but Danny is reeling when he arrives home to find Jesse conducting band practice.

programme.title: Full House S1 3
programme.desc: Stephanie's reluctance to attend her first day of school disappears when Joey and Jesse visit her kindergarten class.

programme.desc: Ernie experiences the breathtaking Bungle Bungles in the heart of the Kimberley, Narelda visits Coranderrk with a Wurundjeri elder and Aaron steps into the studio with didge-legend Dave Hudson.

programme.title: Great Australian Stuff - Food
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Armstrong this series uncovers surprising stories behind some of our most iconic Australian stuff. This episode looks at food including classics like the meat pie, Macadamia nut, Chiko Roll and Vegemite.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 97

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 46
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Better Date Than Never - Episode 3
programme.desc: Charles recovers after a wobbly start to his first date; Nirvali sets off to meet someone new; Olivia's dinner date brings up strong emotions; and Dianne visits one of her biggest supporters.

programme.desc: As the matchmakers send out their singles on first dates, we learn more about the matchmaker's own matches and what they think is the measure of a successful marriage.

programme.desc: Off Country - Episode 1

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Bungle Bungles, Coranderrk, Cairns

programme.title: Great Australian Stuff - Food
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Armstrong this series uncovers surprising stories behind some of our most iconic Australian stuff. This episode looks at food including classics like the meat pie, Macadamia nut, Chiko Roll and Vegemite.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Cultured Creams
programme.desc: Joining Adam to celebrate Refugee Week is Afghan food expert Durkhanai Ayubi and chef and educator Nayran Tabiei, cooking with cultured creams.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice - Sammy J
programme.desc: Alice helps radio host Sammy J break the lasagne curse that's been haunting him for years.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 340
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters.

programme.title: Great Australian Walks - Wilpena Pound
programme.desc: Susie Youssef explores the sacred canyons of Wilpena Pound in South Australia, and is invited into an Indigenous site that is not open to the public.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Celebrating 38 Years of Jane Edmanson
programme.desc: We're celebrating Jane Edmanson's 38 years on the ABC! Costa joins her for a walk through a new display of dry climate natives, Jane visits an Edna Walling-designed property, and we look back at her iconic career highlights.

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours - Episode 3
programme.desc: The trials and tribulations of the social experiment shine a light on what the bigger solutions might be for struggling small towns right across Australia, and what the future might be like.

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 46
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Annabel Crabb's Civic Duty - Fairness
programme.desc: We begin with one of the enduring oddities of the Australian electoral system - preferential voting. Vaunted by mathematicians and theorists as a fairer way of voting. Adopted, uniquely, by Australia in 1918.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 47
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s - Leadership Factor
programme.desc: With a combination of vision and confidence, some extraordinary and brave '80s captains set lofty standards for their team to follow. This episode presents a critique of those who led their countries on Australian soil.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 49
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Fauziah Ibrahim and Johanna Nicholson bring you an engaging mix of the latest news, information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Sunday Island, Atherton Tablelands, Hobart
programme.desc: Ernie traverses the blue waters and tidal passages to Sunday Island, Aaron experiences the magic and culture of the Atherton Tablelands and Rae hears the history of Hobart from a palawa perspective.

programme.title: Clear And Present Danger
programme.desc: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The infamous Musketeers are joined by spirited young swordsman D'Artagnan, as they embark on a mission to retrieve a stolen piece of jewelry for the Queen. However, their task is complicated by the evil tyrant Cardinal Richelieu.

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: An angry, racist, and hard-drinking prison guard who works the executioner’s row reexamines his attitudes while falling in love with the African American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: In Mexico City, a former Marine swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Prince Nuada wishes to animate the Golden Army, a lethal bunch of fighting machines, to conquer the world by ruining the human race. But Hellboy and his allies try to prevent the prince from winning.

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: The life of super-yuppie J.C. is thrown into turmoil when she inherits a baby from a distant relative.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

programme.title: Children Of A Lesser God
programme.desc: Based on the hit Broadway play, it’s the uplifting love story of John Leeds, an idealistic special education teacher, and a headstrong deaf girl named Sarah. Soon their teacher/student relationship blossoms into love.

programme.title: Daylight
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone stars in this urban disaster drama about an explosion that seals off both ends of a commuter tunnel beneath the Hudson River, trapping a diverse band of survivors inside.

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a man is shot dead, pathologist Dr. Antoine Wrice works with investigators to interpret unusual evidence found on the scene and unwind the complex case that could be more than a typical homicide.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: After rideshare driver Carolina Vargas drove a nice stranger to his hotel, she didn't have qualms about giving him another ride. But her trusting gesture turned tragic.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man was arrested for stealing high-end perfumes from a major retailer, and an aspiring mortician struggles to make bail so she can get out for her daughter's homecoming dance.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Tim and Barbara Pasa meet at a gig Tim is performing at and quickly fall for one another. Barbara is a surgical nurse by day, a fun-loving party animal. They marry quickly, shocking their friends.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: OJ’s behaviour sparks a media frenzy, culminating in a high-profile trial. His ongoing violence raises concerns about what happened to Sydney and Justin.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When mother of two, Deanna Cook, missed her daily call to her mom, her family began to worry Deanna's 'stalker' might be involved. After texting and calling Deanna, her family called 911.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A suspect makes a chilling confession about a string of gruesome crimes; a deadly mistake made by a politician comes to light in the interrogation room; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A murderer refuses to cooperate no matter how many questions he faces; a no-nonsense detective wants answers and gets them; an interrogation room can't hold a suspect looking to escape; and more.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an Ohio man emerges from a remote forest with a bullet lodged in his arm having survived a murder attempt, investigators uncover a deadly scheme.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Melissa Lucio was sentenced to death for the murder of her two-year-old daughter, Mariah, and in January 2022 she was given an official execution date of April 27, 2022.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A longstanding feud comes to a head when two neighbours confront each other with guns; a school bus driver goes on a dangerous high-speed chase to outrun an irate parent who attacks her bus with a hammer.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A robber and a jewellery store owner get into a Wild West-style shootout; a stay-at-home mom confronts a coffee shop clerk who used her credit card; a father and son duo fight back against a robbery.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A teen gets nabbed for being in the wrong place at the wrong time, while a man who left town with a warrant gets caught when he returns for his aunt's funeral and faces a one million dollar bail.

programme.title: Homicide Squad New Orleans (S1)
programme.desc: Detective Maurice Stewart investigates the murder of a 15-year-old boy who was gunned down after walking his younger sister home.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a mum fighting for custody of her kids tries to steal a court deputy's gun. A Sovereign Citizen hangs up during a virtual sentencing.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a TikTok star is on trial for murder; a lawyer gets tasered; a teen mum faces multiple felonies; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Gwinnett County Homicide investigates a parking lot brawl that leaves two young men shot dead, and could cost four others their lives in prison — though three of them never fired a shot.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When the battered body of Shawna Yandell, 16, is found floating in Washington State's Yakima River in 1993, detectives first suspect those closest to her.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Zachary Wester, a sheriff's deputy from Jackson County, Florida, stands accused of planting drugs on unsuspecting motorists during routine traffic stops. He's been charged with over 65 counts.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: A man is murdered while defending his friends during a home invasion. Retired Detective Ronnie Leatherman hands off the case to Detective Lacy Lansdown, who must now seek justice for the man's family.

programme.desc: After meeting at a salsa club, Lulu and Ramon Sosa find they make a good team and marry. But after having financial difficulties, the relationship breaks down.

programme.title: La Cabane À Histoires
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Maths exam. Manolo procrastinates and tries to persuade Félix and Lounis to try the effortless method. Flavie takes inspiration from a fight with Pierre-Charles and Ève to write a novel.

programme.title: Tamia
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: In the canton of Basel, we visit the home of Daniel, a fan of antiques who has built and decorated his house thanks to his passion for ancient objects. Then we discover the house of Paul, who has turned an electric transformer station into a home.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: We're off to the Musée des Beaux-Arts in Tours! In the heart of Paris, mosaic artist Luigi La Ferla builds and deconstructs his works. With Mame Kurogouchi, shape is sculpted from the body itself. Painter Camille Viry brings her landscapes to life using traditional decorative painting techniques.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: As an artist in Kabul, the young Shakiba feared for her life. After several years in the 'Théâtre du soleil' company, this Afghan actress and activist wants to help build bridges between the culture of her roots and France.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: Meeting with Adrien Maire, a cyclist from Nice and member of the Unibet Tietema Rockets team.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: A journey rich in flavour through the regions and their terroirs, exploring local specialities and meeting the artisans perpetuating their age-old culinary traditions. An opportunity to stop off in the kitchen of a talented chef to prepare an emblematic regional recipe.

programme.title: Le Coeur À L'Élevage
programme.desc: Lauriane Henchoz, 17 years old, raises Holstein dairy cows. On her farm in Yverdon, the young apprentice embodies the richness of a living heritage and the challenges of an essential profession.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Française

programme.title: Carbone
programme.desc: We are all worried about the climate, but we're still not doing enough to solve the problem. Is our psychology acting as a brake on climate action?

programme.title: Un Alibi
programme.desc: Maude, Pierre and Tom, friends of longstanding, meet up for a birthday party at Max and Lucie's. When they arrive they find Max kneeling beside Lucie's body. His guilt seems obvious. His friends, convinced he's innocent, decide to give him an alibi. But will the group withstand the police investigation?

For Pauline, his mother, the stakes are high. Especially as, recently separated and with no fixed income, she is struggling to find her own stability.

programme.title: Trajet De Nuit
programme.desc: Paris, 3 a.m. A young rideshare driver picks up his passenger. The conversation begins, the routine breaks, but the ride will turn into a confrontation.

programme.title: Les Petits Monstres
programme.desc: Erwan, who is visually impaired, can't wait to get to school to declare his love for Agathe. Every day, he shares a school transport van with David, who is in a wheelchair. But this morning, tensions are running high between the two teenagers.

programme.title: Pompon Ours

Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: La Cabane À Histoires

programme.desc: SpongeBob will do anything to get to meet his newest hero, Kenny The Cat. // Attempting to get more work out of Squidward, Mr. Krabs spins the story of the monstrous Yeti Crab, which eats lazy workers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost along the way. // After failing his driver’s test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Karen tells the fairytale of a nerd trying to steal an action figure from his three little neighbors.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe must attend summer school, and Max is assigned to be her teacher. While they will be busy all summer, Phoebe decides to go solo on missions. She meets a new superhero named Captain Perfect, and discovers they make a good crime-fighting team.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force and Captain Man are called to Paris to protect France's national treasures, Bose is accidentally left alone to try and stop The Toddler from breaking into The Man's Nest.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Man and Kid Danger are going to need a little bit of magic and some help from an old friend if they want to catch a thief.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The East River 3 are on the verge of victory! The Turtles and Mutanimals must team up to stop them, but not everything is as it seems... what is the PEARL and why does Goldfin want it?

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When the house AC breaks during an extreme heat wave, Will takes it upon himself to protect his family and fix it. // Ellie insists on running Raven Club like a dictatorship, so Jack & Lil quit, and Ellie must save her investigation AND best friends.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick's uncontrollable drooling gets out of hand and mouth. // A shape-shifting alien runs loose in the Star home.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
