programme.desc: The Star family finds themselves getting smaller and smaller. // Patrick's evil twin cousin shows up to ruin Patrick' reputation.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family gets stuck in a traffic jam that leads to all human civility getting thrown out the passenger side window. // Jack and Lily attempt to catch a legendary town fish despite horror stories from townsfolk who have tried and failed before them.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack gets his first phone and immediately sends the wrong text to Will, forcing the kids to do whatever it takes to delete it. // When the last hallasand goes missing, fingers point to Halmoni and only a family tribunal will set the record straight.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max pretends to turn evil to infiltrate Mastermind's henchmen and steal the Chip-Chucker, a device that previously turned him evil.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Chapa, Miles, Mika, and Bose are thrilled to have landed dates for the once-every-twenty-years SwellMelonFest until threats come in prompting Ray to make them work security. The threats become a reality when the kids must fight The Cell at the event.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger and Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny's mother visits from the old country. // Granny Tentacles gets her own spin-off show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When the house AC breaks during an extreme heat wave, Will takes it upon himself to protect his family and fix it. // Ellie insists on running Raven Club like a dictatorship, so Jack & Lil quit, and Ellie must save her investigation AND best friends.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark
programme.desc: Every victory has a cost, and now the Maltos must face those consequences. Robby's caught abusing his powers, but Mo and "Detective" Thrash team up to prove their brother's innocence. Meanwhile, Twitch becomes her own worst enemy...

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: When Cecil's boss visits the house, the Stars get trapped in a sitcom. // When Squidina is bedridden, Patrick has to run his show without her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: DoodleBob bites SpongeBob, transforming him into a "WereDoodle". // SpongeBob dresses up for Gorilla Suit Day and is mistaken for a real gorilla.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Without them knowing, Captain Man puts Danger Force through a series of tests to see if he can trust them. But when the tests get out of hand, the tables turn on who can be trusted.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe bring Chloe on an undercover mission to Secret Shores so she can experience life as a normal kid. When a new supervillain threat emerges, the trio must stay in town longer than they anticipated.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: With an invitation to Swellview's most exclusive restaurant, Henry decides to bring his boss, Ray, but finds it more complicated than expected.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isn't all it's cracked up to be.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins' farm, much to his dismay. // Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal - Spot.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick inducts SpongeBob into his prestigious society of dullards and doofuses. // Patrick takes his grime to a new extreme, playing around in so much trash that he becomes unrecognizable.

programme.title: Play Like a Sponge
programme.desc: Owen and Connie meet a wheelchair rugby legend and learn the sport.

programme.title: Play Like a Sponge
programme.desc: Owen and Millie meet a wheelchair fencing legend and learn the sport.

programme.title: Play Like a Sponge
programme.desc: Harmonie and Kieran meet an archery legend and learn the sport.

programme.title: Play Like a Sponge
programme.desc: Harmonie and Kieran meet a swimming legend and learn the sport.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Baby Smurf travels through time. He comes back with Handy Gmurf ... which makes Handy very jealous. // Someone has stolen the Blue Moon festival cake. To find the culprit, Chef has to lead an investigation.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: It's a battle of the wits between Donnie and Bishop as he races through NYC's subway system to stop her evil Mechazoids. But how do you beat an AI that counters your every move?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The origin of the woman called BISHOP! Why does she hate mutants? What is the secret of the Mechazoids? And exactly what happened the night the Turtles fell into Bishop's trap?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap. // SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Dimwitty finds an egg in the woods, he and the other Smurfs put their parenting skills to the test. // Vanity wants to design a new outfit for the Smurfs but he and Tailor have different visions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Blossom and Brainy are transported to an alternate universe where the Smurfs are grey and mean.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: It's the Great Smurf Games in the village! The winning team will receive a magical sphere that grants its owner one wish. Clumsy has got his heart set on taking part so that he can win this coveted prize.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggy's shop, they must resist jamming with the shop's musical treasures. // The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: The Casagrandes
